data.lyric:
[ti:Christmas Tree Farm]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:Christmas Tree Farm]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Christmas Tree Farm - Taylor Swift
[00:00.11]Lyrics by：Taylor Swift
[00:00.20]Composed by：Taylor Swift
[00:00.30]Produced by：Jimmy Napes/Taylor Swift
[00:00.43]Recorded by：Gus Pirelli at London Lane Studios (London, UK)
[00:00.67]Strings & Brass Recorded at：RAK Studios (London, UK)
[00:00.85]Assistant Engineer (Strings & Choir)：Will Purton
[00:00.99]Assistant Engineer：Joseph Wander
[00:01.08]Assistant Engineer：Jamie McEvoy
[00:01.17]Mixed by：Serban Ghenea at Mixstar Studios (Virginia Beach, VA)
[00:01.41]Engineered for mix by：John Hanes
[00:01.54]Mastered by：Randy Merrill at Sterling Sound (New York, NY)
[00:01.78]Drums：Ash Soan
[00:01.85]Bass：Jodi Milliner
[00:01.91]Piano & Backing Vocals：Jimmy Napes
[00:02.03]Moog Bass：Gus Pirelli
[00:02.12]Strings Arranged by：Simon Hale
[00:02.24]Strings Leader：Everton Nelson
[00:02.33]Leader of 2nd Violin：Richard George
[00:02.49]1st Viola：Bruce White
[00:02.61]1st Cello：Ian Burdge
[00:02.72]Double Bass：Chris Laurence
[00:02.82]French Horns：Martin Owen/Laurence Davies/John Thurgood
[00:03.00]Choir Vocal Arrangements by：Lawrence Johnson
[00:03.14]Gospel Choir：The LJ Singers (Wayne Hernandez/Travis J Cole/Glenn Tatenda Gwazai/Paul Lee/Canice-Mimi Otohwo/Lorrain Briscoe/Tarna-Renae Johnson/Jessica Mae Obioha/Wendi Rose/Margeauz Michelle Muzangaza/Tehillah Daniel/Destinee Knight-Scott)
[00:03.14]
[00:03.97]My winter nights are taken up by static
[00:09.05]
[00:09.62]Stress and holiday shopping traffic
[00:14.52]But I close my eyes and I'm somewhere else
[00:19.87]Just like magic
[00:29.51]In my heart is a Christmas tree farm
[00:31.95]Where the people would come
[00:34.06]To dance under sparkling lights
[00:36.69]Bundled up in their mittens and coats
[00:39.09]And the cider would flow
[00:41.28]And I just wanna be there tonight
[00:43.81]Sweet dreams
[00:44.67]Of holly and ribbon
[00:46.56]Mistakes are forgiven
[00:48.32]And everything is icy and blue
[00:52.60]And you would be there too
[00:56.77]Under the mistletoe
[01:00.39]Watching the fire glow
[01:03.81]And telling me I love you
[01:11.02]Just being in your arms
[01:14.20]Takes me back to that little farm
[01:18.13]Where every wish comes true
[01:26.83]In my heart is a Christmas tree farm
[01:29.23]There's a light in the barn
[01:31.51]We'd run inside out from the cold
[01:34.04]In the town kids are dreaming of sleighs
[01:36.36]And they're warm and they're safe
[01:38.56]They wake to see a blanket of snow
[01:40.98]Sweet dreams
[01:41.83]Of holly and ribbon
[01:43.89]Mistakes are forgiven
[01:45.60]And everything is icy and blue
[01:49.84]And you would be there too
[01:54.09]Under the mistletoe
[01:57.67]Watching the fire glow
[02:01.01]And telling me I love you
[02:08.36]Just being in your arms
[02:11.48]Takes me back to that little farm
[02:15.62]Where every wish comes true
[02:21.83]Oh baby yeah
[02:24.05]And when I'm feeling alone
[02:25.90]You remind me of home
[02:27.60]Baby baby Merry Christmas
[02:31.10]And when the world isn't fair
[02:33.02]I pretend that we're there
[02:34.81]Baby baby Merry Christmas to you
[02:42.35]Under the mistletoe to you
[02:45.94]Watching the fire glow
[02:49.45]And telling me I love you
[02:54.67]Baby baby Merry Christmas
[02:58.01]Baby baby Merry Christmas
[03:01.79]Baby baby Merry Christmas
[03:05.14]I love you
[03:08.88]Baby baby Merry Christmas
[03:12.30]Baby baby Merry Christmas
[03:16.10]Baby baby Merry Christmas
[03:18.50]May your every wish come true
[03:33.67]I love you
